filteredArticles.headline: Senior Column by Annabelle Williams | It’s a process, not a plan
filteredArticles.abstract: I’m not a sports person, but I hear their advice is to “trust the process.”

filteredArticles.headline: Senior Column by Elias Rappaport | Make it a habit of saying yes
filteredArticles.abstract: Understand that saying “yes” is praxis. The truth is that not every “yes” is a good decision; not every door opened has treasure on the other side. But more often than you think, a good day at Penn starts by opening one unremarkable door and ends with a dozen more doors unlocked.

filteredArticles.subhead: Views with Varun | Don't let big decisions paralyze you
